Description: The following statement contains a magic number: xhr.OnReadyStateChange = delegate() {                  if ((xhr.ReadyState == ReadyState.Loaded) &&                      (xhr.Status == 200)) {                      WineResults results = Json.ParseData<WineResults>(xhr.ResponseText);                        if (results.Count != 0) {                          _pages.SetValue(Math.Ceil(results.Count / WinesPerPage));                      }                        Wines.SetValue(results.Wines);                        Wine selectedWine = null;                      if ((results.Wines != null) && (results.Wines.Length != 0)) {                          selectedWine = results.Wines[0];                      }                      SelectedWine.SetValue(selectedWine);                  }              };
